data.scheme_name: State Export Awards Scheme - Outstanding State Export Award - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides state export award of upto Rs. 5 lakhs to encourage export promotion activities.
data.eligibility: All export manufacturing units located anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Exporting manufacturing units in Haryana are eligible for export awards if their export turnover is counted by the Director General Foreign Trade. 
  2. The unit must have filed Udyam certificate and Haryana udyam memorandum. 
  3. For the Woman Exporter Award, the unit must be owned and managed by a woman entrepreneur with 51% or higher shareholding, with preference given to proprietorship units. 
  4. Once selected for the award, the unit will not be considered again for 5 years, including the year of selection.
data.beneficiaries: All export manufacturing units located anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Exporting manufacturing units in Haryana are eligible for export awards if their export turnover is counted by the Director General Foreign Trade. 
  2. The unit must have filed Udyam certificate and Haryana udyam memorandum. 
  3. For the Woman Exporter Award, the unit must be owned and managed by a woman entrepreneur with 51% or higher shareholding, with preference given to proprietorship units. 
  4. Once selected for the award, the unit will not be considered again for 5 years, including the year of selection.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context:
1. The Government of India has been impressing upon the State Government to extend the facilities & recognition to the exporting units. 
  2. The State’s performance on the export front has been excellent in spite of lack of natural resources and the state’s distance from the sea ports.
data.objective: To encourage export promotion activities in order to maintain a favorable balance of trade.
data.description: Scheme provides state export award of upto Rs. 5 lakhs  to encourage export promotion activities.
data.how_to_apply: Applications for ‘Export Awards Scheme’ shall be invited through an advertisement published in two newspapers, in addition to public notices on the notice board of District Industries Centers/MSMEs and website of the Industries & Commerce/MSMEs Department
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the selection from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828

data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
